definition.script:
node { ansiblePlaybook( extraVars: [ concent_version: 'v0.10.2-50-g0fe5f995', ], inventory: '/home/jenkins/inventory', playbook: '/home/jenkins/concent-deployment/concent-builder/set-concent-version.yml') ansiblePlaybook( extraVars: [ cluster: 'concent-dev', ], inventory: '/home/jenkins/inventory', playbook: '/home/jenkins/concent-deployment/concent-builder/install-repositories.yml') ansiblePlaybook( extraVars: [ cluster: 'concent-dev', ], inventory: '/home/jenkins/inventory', playbook: '/home/jenkins/concent-deployment/concent-builder/build-test-and-push.yml') ansiblePlaybook( extraVars: [ cluster: 'concent-dev', ], inventory: '/home/jenkins/inventory', playbook: '/home/jenkins/concent-deployment/concent-builder/deploy.yml') ansiblePlaybook( extraVars: [ cluster: 'concent-dev', ], inventory: '/home/jenkins/inventory', playbook: '/home/jenkins/concent-deployment/concent-builder/configure-and-run-tests.yml')
}
